name: CSS
description: Explanation of CSS Syntax and Properties

Inserting Stylesheet.val: Import CSS and apply only to the corresponding media type

General Syntax.val: Basic syntax of css declaration block
Class selector selects and styles all elements with class="class"
ID selector styles the element with id="id"

General Properties.val: Specifies the type of box used for an HTML element
Specifies how content overflowing its box is handled
Specifies whether or not an element is visible

Font Properties.val: Specifies the font style for a text
Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font
Sets how thick or thin characters in text should be displayed
Sets the size of a font

Text Properties.val: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text
Specifies the horizontal alignment of text in an element
Specifies the decoration added to text
Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block
Sets the vertical alignment of an element
Increases or decreases the white space between words
Changes the text direction of an element

Box-Model Properties.val: Sets the height of an element
Sets the width of an element
Defines the space between the element border and the element content

Position Properties.val: Specifies on which sides of an element where floating elements are not allowed to float
Specifies whether or not an element should float
The left position of an element
The top position of an element
Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element
Specifies the stack order of an elemen

Background Properties.val: Specifies the background color of an element
Specifies an image to use as the background of an element
Specify how image should be repeated (x or y axis)
Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page
Sets the starting position of a background image.

List Properties.val: Specifies the type of list-item marker in a list
Specifies if the list-item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow
Replaces the list-item marker with an image
